answers.answer: Hello and hope you are doing well.The symptoms described by you could be due to neuropathy. It is a disorder of the nerves which causes numbness, tingling, unusual sensations and sometimes pain. Diabetes Mellitus can cause neuropathy. Other causes like vitamin deficiencies, alcohol consumption and certain medications can cause neuropathy. You may need to consult your primary care physician to detect the cause.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.

question: when i lay down to go to sleep i get shocking type of feeling in my head and it goes to my feet also causes stingers in my heart area my arms and fingers also it feels like my getting a electrical shock of some type
title: Brain Inflamation
